snippet: Syrian government officials at a checkpoint near the rebel-held town of Daraya turned away the convoy, carrying baby formula and medicine.

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

lead_paragraph: Syrian government officials at a checkpoint near the rebel-held town of Daraya turned away the convoy, carrying baby formula and medicine.

headline.main: In Syria, an Aid Convoy Is Refused Entry to a Besieged Town
